local_intent: Perceive white_plate, compute top grasp, approach and align, execute Pick, then verify grasp stability.
assumptions: Gripper is already opened (earlier OpenGripper executed)
White plate is within sensor view and reachable
ComputeGraspPose will publish grasp_white_plate on the blackboard
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT grasp phase: detection → grasp computation → alignment → pick → stability check, matching the stepwise plan and success criteria.
